footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Arlecchino | Update Date: 10/05/2025 | Editor: .m1zuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Crimson Moon's Semblance__
Signature weapon and best choice for Arlecchino.

__Primordial Jade Winged-Spear__
Generally Arlecchino's second-best weapon.

__Staff of Homa__
Amazing stat stick even if its passive is not fully utilized.

__Staff of Scarlet Sands__
Performs very well in Vaporize or Melt teams.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Deathmatch and Ballad of the Fjords__
Obtained via Battle Pass. Decent CRIT stat sticks. Ballad's EM is more useful in Vaporize or Melt teams.

__Calamity Queller, Vortex Vanquisher__
5-star stat sticks

__White Tassel__
Arlecchino's best free weapon. Works best in teams with Bennett to make up for its low Base ATK.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery|<goblet> Pyro DMG or ATK%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Invitation to a Beheading
**2)** Burst: Balemoon Rising and Skill: All Is Ash

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Because Arlecchino's burst is used as an emergency healing, little amount of Energy Recharge is needed. 

In Burning teams, Arlecchino can use 4pc Unfinished Reverie set.
